Package index

Build targets

build_all()
Build all Zashboard targets
build_static()
Build static HTML
build_shiny()
Build Shiny app
build_shinylive()
Build Shinylive app
build_quarto()
Build Quarto

Spec & validation

zashboard_read_spec()
Read a Zashboard spec (YAML) from disk
zashboard_read_validate()
Read and validate a Zashboard spec
zashboard_validate_spec()
Validate a Zashboard spec (light V1 checks)
zashboard_spec
Zashboard spec (v1) — minimal schema

Manifest

zashboard_as_manifest()
Convert a Zashboard spec to a manifest
zashboard_validate_manifest()
Validate a manifest (light schema checks)
zashboard_manifest()
Create a Zashboard manifest (convenience wrapper)

Data connectors

zashboard_connect_duckdb()
Connect to a DuckDB database
zashboard_execute_sql()
Execute a SQL query on a connector (DuckDB/MSSQL)
zashboard_connect_arrow()
Connect to an Arrow dataset
zashboard_execute_collect()
Collect rows from an Arrow dataset connector
zashboard_disconnect()
Disconnect a zashboard connector
zashboard_connect_mssql()
Connect to Microsoft SQL Server (stub)

Theming

zashboard_theme()
Default Zashboard theme (Bootstrap 5 via bslib)

Scaffolding

zashboard_init()
Initialize a new Zashboard spec folder
